oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1954-03-27 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from March 27, 1954. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host, performer), Helen Traubel (performer), Rod Brasfield (performer), the Anita Kerr Singers (performers), Minnie Pearl (performer), Little Jimmy Dickens (performer), Stringbean (performer), and Don Davis (performer). Part 2: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/628
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Rod Brasfield; Helen Traubel; Anita Kerr Singers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- It's Been Nice (George Morgan) -- Opening statement (George Morgan, Grant Turner) -- George Morgan introduces Helen Traubel -- Helen Traubel and George Morgan talk -- George Morgan introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, George Morgan, Helen Traubel) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- George Morgan talks about Helen Traubel -- No One Will Ever Know (Helen Traubel) -- Robe Of Calvary (George Morgan, Anita Kerr Singers)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Traubel, Helen; Brasfield, Rod; Anita Kerr Singers; Minnie Pearl; Dickens, Little Jimmy, 1920-; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Davis, Don, 1928 December 22-
